projects.shortDesc: The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy moon
projects.iWant: to have an app that transcribes meetings in real time

projects.name: Erlich Bachmann

projects.shortDesc: Peter Piper picked a peck of pickled pepper
projects.iWant: to have a way to get my kids to do chores and win prizes
projects.soThat: I can have a nice glass of wine when I get home at night

projects.name: Bridget Jones
